killing that violinist, then everybody must refrain
from doing a great many different sorts of things. Everybody must refrain
from  slitting  his  throat,  everybody  must  refrain  from  shooting  him—and
everybody must refrain from unplugging you from him. But does he have a
right against everybody that they shall refrain from unplugging you from
him? To refrain from doing this is to allow him to continue to use your kid-
